website_summaries.verdict: We give this model high marks for its unique design that allows for maximum utility.
pros: A unique and attractive changing table that features a handy hamper that can be used for baby's dirty laundry
It also has three drawers to keep items in place in the nursery
cons: The Badger Basket changing table is somewhat shorter than others we tested, and may not be suited to tall users

customer_reviews.title: Design received is not consistent with product pictures.
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed with this purchase - but not returning since it is already assembled and functions "enough". There are 2 main reasons for dissatisfaction. First, several parts were scuffed or paint was scraped off leaving bare wood. Second, the item design has been modified. There are no wooden support shelves for the 2 top drawers.This lack of support allows the drawers to constantly slide off the rails and onto each other. I expect this will only get worse over time. If the changing table was not such a hassle to pack up and return - it would be going back. I would not recommend this changing table, and knowing what I know now, would not have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Moriah Yorkey

customer_reviews.title: Service it's purpose, but not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing this out of frustration. While the changing table itself serves it's purpose, The model itself was changed without any mention. This model showed shelves under the baskets and as they determined it's a safety risk it was simply changed and removed. Nothing was mentioned on Amazon and they were not aware either. I received a replacement from Amazon with the same change. When I reached out to the manufacturer I got an email saying they changed the model and then no follow up from them beyond that. Service from Amazon A+++ Service from the manufacturer not so much.
customer_reviews.author: FDan

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my daughter and son-in law for their first baby. The table is sturdy and he didn't have any issues putting it together. It looks great in the nursery and my daughter loves all the storage it has and that it has a hamper. I thought the price was very reasonable and was very happy that is was part of the Prime program
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Lowery

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Not an eye sore...sturdy, easy to put together. Great as a secondary changing station if you have a big house and need multiple in strategic areas. I do recommend buying a thicker changing pad. That's all. Everything else is great. I wish there was more room up too for a wipe warmer or dispenser, but then it would be a giant and I wouldn't be able to hide it in corner. So it's cool. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: katarina sidova

customer_reviews.title: 6 Years Strong
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this changing table for 6 years and its been used across 3 different children. Overall I'd say it has served us very well and held up quite well also. It is starting to show its age a bit, but it has been 6 years! The storage totes still hold their shape well and there is plenty of room to hold PJs, diapers and changing pads, burp rags. Well worth the investment and I would recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: This changing table is made very poorly. The screws that came with the table did not fit properly. We had to use different screws to hold the pieces together. Also, a piece of the "wood" on one of the legs was split when we received it and the shelves are not stable/sturdy. We probably should have returned it, but decided to keep it as we needed something ASAP and there were too many pieces to try to get everything back in the box. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Cole

customer_reviews.title: A great product my 1 year daughter approves this review.
customer_reviews.text: A great product. The price is amazing considering how much you get. My daughter is safe on the changing table with no issues. Assembling this table was not a problem. Everything is really convenient and well thought out with the layout of the changing. You have everything you need within less of an arms reach. You can grab diapers, baby wipes clothes and put away dirty onesies with no problem and still keep a hand on your little one with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L. Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Instructions and Damaged Wood
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this table 4 or 5 stars, but the product came with wood chipped, and the building instructions were terrible. The entire instructions go without telling you to put the two wooden boards for the bottom and top, and when you get to the end, you have these two boards you need to get in but you can't because it doesn't mention it in the directions and it's too late to add it on. You have to undo one entire side that you worked on to get this board to get in, and even then it's extremely difficult and scratches other parts of the table. I was very annoyed by this experience.
customer_reviews.author: Ashur khan

customer_reviews.title: Mold and damage. Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: Well it is absolutely horrendous. I found mold the moment I opened up my box. What a great way to harm people's children. Thanks Amazon. On top of that, my item had splinters and damages to it
customer_reviews.author: Louise N

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price and versatility
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it's a great option. The structure itself is sturdy. Thw two pieces I am worried about durability would be the big one under the changing pad and the big one on the bottom that the laundry bin sits on. I may have my husband make something more sturdy to put in place. I did not use the pad it came with as I was gifted a thicker one. Overall, I am satisfied with this purchase and will be keeping.
customer_reviews.author: kbilderb

customer_reviews.title: Came broke but cute besides that.
customer_reviews.text: It came cracked but was too much of a hassle to take apart what was already assembled witj a destroyed box by the time we noticed it and we just made it work. Wish would would have spent so much money on a half broken product. But besides that its functional and cute! Simple, clean and nice storage. A few little fixers and it's a good changing table now.
customer_reviews.author: Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: The assembly of this product is sorta confusing, it seems to back track a lot so read ahead before moving onto next step. Has great storage and overall design is great! I would recommend you to buy or use a mesh laundry bag for the hamper, so nothing gets moldy. That’s just a no brainer but it didn’t come with one so that’s what I suggest. The sturdiness of this product is ok, we tightened all the screws as much as possible and it still wiggles a little. Nothing to be worried about but just know it is what you pay for an changing tables aren’t forever!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: New Parents-you need this!
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad that I bought this! After using the changing table from our pack and play for several months, this was much needed! I love the storage and the fact that the hamper fits perfectly. I ended up buying another changing pad because the one provided was very thin. It fits nice and our living room and doesn’t interfere with the decor.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Davis

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible experience!! It came all busted up. It took HOURS to assemble (anyone on here who says it’s easy to assemble is smoking the hard stuff). AND to top it all off, all three baskets, hamper and the changing pad were missing from my box. I tried to get help but they wanted me to disassemble the entire thing and find time to go to the post office to mail it back, instead of just sending me the missing pieces. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great changing station and handy drawers. I got it specifically for the hamper. It came with a lot of parts though. It took a good half an hour to an hour or so for my husband and I to put it together but everything fit together perfectly. Only one star off due to strong smell of the drawers/hamper. It does air out in a day or two though.
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’m extremely upset. The baskets do not fit and are all used and extremely dirty. How anyone could sell this to someone is beyond me. It also took my husband two hours to put together before I had to jump in to help. If I do not get new baskets and a hamper from the company, I will be returning this item. Which actually makes me even more angry because we will have to break it down, fit it back in the box and drive somewhere to return it. Not happy in the slightest.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Mehr

customer_reviews.title: Its sturdy, fits the pad up-top just fine
customer_reviews.text: We got the table as we didn't want to have a combo crib and changing table. The Pros: This thing is a heck of a value compared to everything else I looked at. Its sturdy, fits the pad up-top just fine, wasn't too bad to assemble (took me little less than an hour) and it comes with all the hampers/baskets as well. Hard to beat the value from what I saw. Cons: Only one really, one of the pieces of wood came with a small split in it. I doubt it would have been an issue but regardless, I used wood epoxy to make sure it sealed to repair it. Structurally, I could lay in it now (I checked). Recommeded
customer_reviews.author: James Six

customer_reviews.title: Love this changing table! Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: We have a small apartment with limited space, so this changing table is great. The extra drawers and laundry hamper are perfect for storing baby's stuff. I hang a separate diaper caddy off the side and it works great to keep all of diapering stuff at arms reach. The table has a pad that is soft enough for changing a diaper, and railings that keep baby from rolling off. Also, the pad is easy to wipe off if anything gets on it (poop, pee or spit up!). Plus it looks good and doesn't look cheap/ugly. I love this table and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: The unit went together without much difficulty and is fairly sturdy once fully assembled (he's not going to fall through
customer_reviews.text: The nursery we put together for my son is a little snug and we needed a changing table that could fit well at the foot of his crib. The unit went together without much difficulty and is fairly sturdy once fully assembled (he's not going to fall through, but I wouldn't put my full weight on it). The drawers and laundry basket are fabric/fabric covered cardboard, but serve their purpose and provide nice storage for diapers and other needed items. The pad it comes with, as others have said, is very thin. We replaced it with the "Summer Infant 4-Sided Changing Pad" and it fit nicely. Overall a win
customer_reviews.author: sc20

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality for the price. Sturdy. Includes a pad. I love that it has drawers so you can hide all your crap since this went in our living room. It took some time to assemble; that’s the only down side. I can recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Woolf

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: EDIT*** This fell apart after just a couple months. Not worth it for only a couple months use! 4 stars to 1 Definelty light weight but is such a pain to put together and you wouldn’t think it’d be that difficult. It seems pretty stable but not going to use probably after a year just because it’s a little nevracking.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this table
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this less stars I would. It's extremely poorly made. The thinly covered fabric cardboard baskets started coming apart in less than a year. When I emailed the company they referred me to their website where for $30 I could buy replacement baskets. After sending an additional email I haven't heard back from them. I would NEVER buy anything from them again. Poor product and poor customer service, what a terrible combination.
customer_reviews.author: B. Young

customer_reviews.title: Great value, good storage, perfect for cloth diapers
customer_reviews.text: I've had this changing table for 9 months and I love it. I almost got one from Babies R Us but it only had two shelves and that didn't seem very practical to me. I'm so happy I found this one! We use cloth diapers so having lots of functional storage space is super important. I love having the hamper built right in too! The paint is wearing a little bit on the edge where my husband's belt hits it regularly, but that's not unexpected for the price. Overall very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Nice and functional
customer_reviews.text: This changing table is a nice size and we like the simple clean look of it. The drawers are nice to keep diapers and other necessities in and the hamper is more than large enough for all of our baby's clothes. I also like that the changing pad is waterproof and can be wiped down if there is an accident. The only reason I did not rate it 5 stars is because one of the screws was malformed on top and could not be used.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi C

customer_reviews.title: Great changing table
customer_reviews.text: Great changing table. Bought and assembled it one month before our son was born. He's now seven months and still fits comfortably in it. Quality is good. However, drawers and hamper are fabric and not super durable, but strong enough for baby stuff, and have shown no wear after seven months. Assembly was pretty simple with decent directions provided. Our unit had one top rail with a slight crack in it. It was probably still okay/safe to use, but I contacted the manufacturer (sent them a picture), and they promptly sent out a replacement part. Totally satisfied and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing. Hard to set up, the cubes warp. It works fine for what I want. Mostly didn’t return because I didn’t want to take it apart to send it back. It was a good price. I would’ve much rather pay more for a better product than deal with the disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Wilder

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: This is way more of a pain to put together than you might think, considering you don't have to put drawers together. Other reviewers that said to not tighten the screws all the way until the whole thing is together. Also, the changing mat is on the thin side. But it's ok for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephany Corranthe

customer_reviews.title: I love this changing table
customer_reviews.text: I love this changing table! It looks even better in person than it does in the picture. The wood finishing looks amazing, it is sturdy and very durable. It doesn't teeter-toder or anything like that and the drawers are much more durable than I imagined and have far more room than I thought they would. Overall I'm so happy I got this and will even use it for my own personal belongings once it is no longer needed for my daughter. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Brimelow

customer_reviews.title: Cute changing table for a decent price
customer_reviews.text: This review is based on initial impression. We haven't used it yet as our soon won't arrive for a few more weeks. My husband put it together by himself. He did get frustrated with the instructions, but I think he got it all together in 45 min to an hour. We purchased a separate summer infant mattress as the one that comes with this is pretty flimsy. Overall, I'm very pleased with the way it looks & the storage space it provides. I think its a good table for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: Lasted well through twins up to potty-training!
customer_reviews.text: Still structurally sound after 4.5 yrs! Obviously after toilet training at 3 we stopped needing to use it for our twins, but I’ve used it for clothing storage since. I plan to resell it but am keeping the hamper and three drawers, which are still in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: paralelle

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in Amazon box which looked ok. Original packaging box was in poor shape. (Looked as if it had been open, returned, then fell off every truck it went on.) Product was broken in many places and missing pieces.
customer_reviews.author: emma

customer_reviews.title: Be realistic about what you are buying and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This changing table is of the quality I was expecting for the price. It definitely isn't real wood and it takes a little patience to put together, but once it's together it looks good and appears that it will be very functional. If you buy this expecting the quality of a $300+ changing table you will be disappointed. If you have more realistic expectations and are looking for a functional piece of furniture, give it a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren E.

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty bad. The bars on the top are just ...
customer_reviews.text: The "wood" is a disaster! Chips and nicks all over it puffy filled and painted over. It's pretty bad. The bars on the top are just the right space for baby's arms to slip in and out but also just enough that they get stuck in this jerky wobbly phase. Ouch! Any movement or kick leave the little one hitting wood bars. It's nice looking once together but it's a cheap piece of furniture. I would have returned it if it didn't take an hour and a half to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Russell

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we need
customer_reviews.text: For our newborn we just wanted a a simple changing table with plenty of diaper and blanket storage. This item is just that. Assembly was about two hours during a football game. There are no extra screws included in the bag and it's easy to misplace one. Once assembled, the item is fairly sturdy. No wobbling or swaying. The quality isn't cheap in appearance. The hamper is useful and the drawers serve our purpose. We purchased a separate changing mattress as the one included is just a thin, plain, plastic, foam mat. We are pleased with this purchase and would make it again. This item is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Little Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Questionable quality. Several holes were drilled to the incorrect size. Easy enough to assemble, but I doubt it will last the limited amount of time it is needed. Actual platform for holding the child is very thin, thinner than most quick-assembly tables, they know this as it comes with a thin metal bar to reinforce the platform. Not the worst thing I have ever purchased, but I wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Compulsive Shopper

customer_reviews.title: changing table
customer_reviews.text: it's absolutely beautiful and just what my daughter wanted. Her husband had it put together in a jiffy and it now waits for the new baby to be born.
customer_reviews.author: HMG

customer_reviews.title: Decent but not great
customer_reviews.text: Quality was much lower than expected. Changing pad is super thin. Ours had stickers that had been painted over (looks like by mistake) but if you remove them there is no color beneath so we had to leave them on. No foot pads so it leaves color streaks on our tile floor when we move it to clean beneath. Came with a lot of scratches on it. Seems over priced for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Not Assigned

customer_reviews.title: I like the look of this table
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this table. It seems sturdy enough, but the canvas drawers are a little bit cheap. We have been using ours less than a month and the hamper is already ripped on the inside and one of the drawers is starting to unravel at the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: The wood is soooo cheap and not sturdy. The baskets are very flimsy and the threading ...
customer_reviews.text: The wood is soooo cheap and not sturdy. The baskets are very flimsy and the threading is coming loose after only one day. It smells really bad too. Had to spray it with Febreeze. There were also missing screws. One star for prompt delivery of missing screws once we requested them online. One star for it looking nice once it's built.
customer_reviews.author: geekk

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: My product came damaged. Not very sturdy at all. If we wouldn’t have had everything all laid out for assembly we would have returned. I do like the look and like the storage of this changing table. But definitely not worth the money for the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Linneman

customer_reviews.title: Great product for this price
customer_reviews.text: The unit is durable and easy to install. Only reason I did not give a 5 star is because the installation manual was not included the only half of the components are labelled. Beside that, I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Cracked when we put it together, drawers fall off shelves
customer_reviews.text: While we did end up keeping this, the wood cracked when we screwed it together. Plus, the fabric drawers don't stay on their tracks easily since the tracks are thin. But it's the least expensive one we could find with a laundry basket and at this size, which we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Disney Style

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for the quality!
customer_reviews.text: My husband set this up completely on his own and didn't seem to struggle with the set up process too much. We can't wait to use it for Baby Girl in a few weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Sara O

customer_reviews.title: Damaged pieces - very flimsy
customer_reviews.text: To a buyer with a newborn, this product looked nice. While reviewing various models, this appeared to fit our needs. This arrived in a timely fashion. The crux of this problem was that four pieces were damaged and pivotal pieces were missing from the shipment. Very aggrivating and disappointing. I was issued a refund. This may not happen to you, just be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time, effort and money.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this item, was received with a broken part. Ordered a replacement through Amazon, four of the parts were missing. Not going to try to get another replacement. The parts are very flimsy and cheap anyway. Don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: IainMacB

customer_reviews.title: Nice table
customer_reviews.text: Not the sturdiest table on earth, but it should do the trick. The pad is really thin, so I will be replacing that with something else. The drawers and the hamper are a good size.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Chipped paint and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The changing table is nice to look at if you don’t notice the paint chipped off certain areas. The wooden pieces came all scuffed up. I haven’t had a chance to use it yet and if it wasn’t already assembled, I’d return it because it’s so flimsy and scuffed up. I wish I didn’t waste my money on this table. I’ve heard so many good things about this company but unfortunately this experience hasn’t been a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice simple light weight change table
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice simple light weight change table. Putting it together was a bit involved but worth it. I didn't want to buy an expensive piece of furniture just for diaper changes and storage. This is lightweight enough to move around to different parts of the house easily if needed. The large basket is great for dirty baby laundry
customer_reviews.author: Ashley A

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing the nursery
customer_reviews.text: The changing table is the perfect height for me. I'm 5' 5". I use the fabric drawers to store changing items as well as other baby items such as extra bibs, towels, and bath items. The large bin is great as a hamper for soiled clothes and towels. I'm glad we didn't spend a fortune on a piece of furniture that we will only be using a short time. We did end up using a separate changing pad on the top as the one it comes with is rather thin.
customer_reviews.author: The Lucky Ones

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Good for limited use.
customer_reviews.text: I had to write something because I am currently on Amazon looking for a replacement for this. Cheap. Flimsy. I have twins and I am moving and I know this will not make it. If it did I feel it will not last me by the time the babes are out of diapers. After 10 months the baskets are worn but alright. The table moves but that’s ok. Wood chipped. This is a $40 item.
customer_reviews.author: Pageyapit

customer_reviews.title: Great functionality, poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: I love the functionality of this table, but the assembly was a huge pain. The locking cams for the shelves were awful to install and one of them barely lined up correctly after a ton of monkeying with it. I had to drill new holes for one of the top rails to because they did not line up correctly. Would have returned it if I hadn't been pressed for time with my little one being due that week.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Broken right out of the box. Was hoping to just get a replacement but Amazon wouldn’t let me.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Lang

customer_reviews.title: Good but didn't come with with everything
customer_reviews.text: The structure is good. The color is good. The only reason I wouldn't give it 5 star is because it did NOT come with the safety strap that was supposed to be enclosed with item. Also, the laundry basket is smaller than I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: ... this would be too short but honestly it was perfect and I am fairly tall for a girl at ...
customer_reviews.text: After reading some other reviews I was worried this would be too short but honestly it was perfect and I am fairly tall for a girl at 5'8. I really don't have to bend too much while changing her. The hamper and drawers are awesome and so convenient. The only thing I had a problem with was that the changing pad didn't come with a cover for it so I had to order one separate otherwise I would have given five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, convenient. Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I got this diaper changing table. Got it for a good deal and it makes diaper changing time so quick. Helps me stay organized!
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Nice table, bad baskets
customer_reviews.text: After only 3 days of light use, the baskets came apart at the seams. The table is sturdy but is difficult to assemble. Overall I'm happy with the product and its a lot sturdier than my other changing table (graco) but I'm disappointed with the baskets.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Be careful putting it together,  otherwise fine!
customer_reviews.text: The leg broke, because the wood is not high grade. Husband was able to put it together with his tools. As for the changing table and storage, it's fine. It works.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela's view

customer_reviews.title: Nice simple changing table.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice simple changing table. It is sturdy, looks good and handy that is comes with the hamper &a fabric drawers. We changed out to a thicker changing pad on the top, but I think almost all changing tables come standard with the really thin pads.
customer_reviews.author: Ren Fam

customer_reviews.title: Good storage, not as good design
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and all the drawers definitely come in handy for storage. Although I followed the directions, it seemed like parts of it weren't cut correctly or something because they didn't quite meet when trying to attach them. I think a piece or two even ended up cracking. Another thing is that if you have a diaper stacker with a metal hanger at the top as opposed to ties or velcro, the side pieces are too wide to hook the hanger on, so I ended up having to hook it onto the front.
customer_reviews.author: GlttrGuitarAngel

customer_reviews.title: Has held up Over 2 Years
customer_reviews.text: Great baby changing table. When your done you can convert into a toy box or stuffed animal holder.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Zugehoer

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: Quality is mediocre at best. It’ll hold up but not worth the price. Missing about 5 screws. One on the side support (which came pre-assembled) was cracked length wise on the wood. Probably over tightened at factory. Need wood glue and we added another piece of wood below for added support. We would have returned but the box was destroyed a bit while shipping. We’ll make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Zellars

customer_reviews.title: Functions, but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Even when tightened all the way it is a little wobbly. It comes with a diaper changing pad that is very thin. The wood was already chipped when it arrived. Overall, a decent value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ivester

customer_reviews.title: Great changing table
customer_reviews.text: I love this changing table! Put it together easily at 9 months pregnant, and it works great for my baby
customer_reviews.author: Karebearkrueger

customer_reviews.title: Great table for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: This has been perfect! It arrived quickly and only took about 10 minutes to put together. Looks as pictures and good quality so far (3 months in). Slim profile but big enough for everyday use. Use it as our downstairs table in our master and doesn’t look Awkward or out of place.
customer_reviews.author: D.Pensala

customer_reviews.title: Just okay.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price the coloring chips off the wood super easily. The instructions are alittle difficult none of the pieces or hardware is labeled.
customer_reviews.author: phoebe

customer_reviews.title: Broke dangerously after a year of use.
customer_reviews.text: The materials are very cheap, the piece that fits under the pad that supports the baby snapped while under normal use. (after about a year.) Lucky I caught the kiddo, as he was going down with the ship. This product is dangerous and poorly made. Please spend your money elsewhere - check the photo for how the product broke. Also worth noting that Amazon features next to no support for this item. BUY AT YOUR OWN RISK.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I love the storage bins and hamper it comes with but the table itself is not very sturdy and one of pieces were very scratched up/chipped. Not sure if they were damaged during shipping or what... still a decent deal considering the price I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Trischler

customer_reviews.title: Regret buying
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this table is awful. Doesn't come with correct parts. Doesn't feel too sturdy and on top of that can't put drawers where they are suppose to go because of wrong parts sent basically for two hampers.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good table, be sure to tighten up
customer_reviews.text: Not as study as I expected. Assembly was easy, but I needed to re-tighten the frame after a week or so of use. Not sure if that's a continuous thing, but worth noting. Aside from that we love this table!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad Smell
customer_reviews.text: The changing table is very functional, but the canvas and cardboard storage bins smell terrible. I was sent a new set and it smelled the same. I tried baking soda, airing it out in the sun, febreze, and even vinegar. I've had this table for about 5 months and the smell is still there.
customer_reviews.author: Hiep

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, not the best quality, but it serves its purpose and I love the storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Kerriann Hammock

customer_reviews.title: Like the storage options better than open shelves
customer_reviews.text: We fit the diaper pail underneath and clothes in the basket with diapers and misc. prefer the neat and tidy look to open shelves
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Mom

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buck
customer_reviews.text: We actually got it as a spare changing station for our multilevel home. Nice and simple design and easy to assemble. Sturdy enough to hold toddlers. Couldn’t find a better one for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Uday Yenugula

customer_reviews.title: Love the storage bins and hamper
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these as extra changing stations. Love the storage bins and hamper. My only complaint is that the bins slide off the sides and are not secured by side rails.
customer_reviews.author: Dina D

customer_reviews.title: Damaged before we even opened it
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived damaged. There was a hole in the box and you can see through to tell that the wood was damaged on the actual product. There is no padding whatsoever in these boxes so no wonder so many customers complain about receiving it damaged. Trust the reviews and don’t risk it, now have to go through hassle of returning it as soon as it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: M Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Good option for the frugal
customer_reviews.text: Seems very sturdy and I love that it comes with the little baskets for storage. Perfect if you are limited in storage space in your home. I'm keeping wipes and diapers in there as well as my little one's shoes in the very bottom basket. The only criticism I have is that it IS cheap so don't expect some gorgeous product. Also it needs quite a bit of time to "off-gas" that new chemical type smell. I wouldn't recommend putting it straight into a space with baby or children sleeping. Build it and put it in your garage or a room no one sleeps in for a few weeks. It does fade. Great, cheap option!
customer_reviews.author: Danny DeBeikes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this simple changing table! Exactly as pictured! Very sturdy, fairly easy assemble, would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Melendrez

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I got the cherry colored version. I almost took apart what I initially had together and returned to Amazon. An interference fit with the bed and bottom shelf panels caused issue with getting joints to pull together. Grooves for the panels didn't line up great and barrel nuts were inappropriately placed in some grooves. It is a disposable changing table for a hundred bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Deep storage drawers and hamper
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this changing table especially the deep drawers and the hamper
customer_reviews.author: Ron 🏍

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, a lot of parts so takes at ...
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, a lot of parts so takes at least an hour to put together, once it is together it wabbles, it’s also chipped all over. Would be better off buying one on Craigslist if trying to save some money - that’s what I was trying to do when I bought this one.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Love the design! But has a weird smell
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the design! and the storage capacity. However, the clothes hamper has a weird smell. It might have picked it up from baby's dirty clothes or it is just how it smells (not sure), but either way, I have to keep it away because the smell really bothers me.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Casares

customer_reviews.title: Beware of shelf installation.
customer_reviews.text: This table is well constructed. The only issue we had is putting the top and bottom full shelf in. It was difficult to install and stretched one whole rail. Do not righted all the screws or they won't go in at all. We had to loosen all the screws to get them in.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Such a great buy, Very convenient to have everything in arms reach. Extra bonus having the hamper right underneath the table.
customer_reviews.author: Rena

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Product damaged on the edges. Many areas where wood is damaged around screw holes. Overall not a well constructed product.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Assembly took some work.
customer_reviews.text: The screws didn't want to sit right so we had to glue it as well. Other than that, it's very nice looking and serves it's purpose.
customer_reviews.author: melissa stefanek

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Small Places
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought this changing table for our granddaughter. She was extremely pleased with it because the dirty clothes hamper came with the table, and it was easily accessible as it was right under the table itself. There were also three drawers to hold the baby's clothes. It is truly a multi-functional piece of furniture, and it was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: PANSY

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My son is rather wiggly during diaper changes, and the whole structure would shake. Even though this looks good, it was not sturdy enough for an active toddler. We had to get rid of it due to safety concerns
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Follow instructions very closely! Also needs thicker change mat
customer_reviews.text: Was a little difficult assembling as the spacing for the drawers and the large basket are very similar - but if assemble the the wrong way the drawers do not fit. I had to take everything apart turn the couple peices around and reasseble. Once put together properly it is nice. In reading previous reviews I ordered a change mat at the same time, as the one that comes with this is barely a 1/2 thick.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin K

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money on this item.
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice but not good quality, not sturdy. It smells really bad-this can’t be safe for babies. Paint/wood chips easily. We didn’t even get to use it. What a waste of time assembling it. Returning!
customer_reviews.author: Jojoam

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality baby changing station that is very sturdy and easy to put together. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Best changing table ever!
customer_reviews.text: Great and cheap! I’m in love with this table it’s so simple and I love that it came with the drawers unlike most companies that make you buy them separate. It also is perfectly color matched to my crib that was bought separate which is super rare overall this company is great!!
customer_reviews.author: Laila

customer_reviews.title: Grandparents be happy!
customer_reviews.text: A quality table at a reasonable price. We bought this for our first grandchild, it will last for a long time. Be sure to order this: Summer Infant Contoured Changing Pad Amazon Frustration Free Packaging and a cover for that as well, the pad that comes with the table is chintzy. Waterproof, but thin and chintzy.
customer_reviews.author: Flo

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. It works for what I need it for (a toddler who will be potty-trained soon), but be careful putting it together, the wood is just particle wood.
customer_reviews.author: kpruitt

customer_reviews.title: arrived damaged - ripped drawers
customer_reviews.text: I like the overall modern look of this changing table but 2 drawers arrived ripped and damaged and we didn't notice it until we put the table together - and I'm not sure who or how to contact to get request a replacement. so, overall I'm disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most complicated piece of furniture I have ever put together!
customer_reviews.text: ok price, ok product for a one time baby use.. Im sure it wont make it more than a year. It came with a bag of 30+ hardware, painful! Some pieces were warped making construction almost impossible. The hex screws were "deformed" the tools/ alan wrench it came with didnt fit correctly causing more time waste, it was not the tool but the screws that were the problem. In the end its together, 2 hours later, a whole lot of cursing. The cloth drawers and basket very good quality considering. Changing pad worthless, I put a standard table top one in and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Great product, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product, especially for the price. I am happy with the quality. Great addition to a nursery, especially if you're seeking a changing table that offers extra storage.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to assemble and I over tightened everything
customer_reviews.text: The varnish smells. I aired it out on the balcony for almost a week, but never really went away. The baskets are cloth covered cardboard. I found a cheaper table at ikea, but without the baskets. The ikea one also smells less. It was easy to assemble and I over tightened everything, but it is sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in this changing table, even for the price. Difficult to put together due to screws not fitting in the holes. My husband had to drill the holes deeper in order to get everything to fit together correctly. Fabric baskets are not good quality- they came dirty and have pink stains on them. Over all quality is very cheap. I would not reccomend this changing table.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this changing table. Also purchased the LA contoured changing pad on Amazon to go with it since the space of the pad is a slightly smaller measurement than standard pads and although the LA pad is a little smaller than the space it works just fine. One disappointment is the drawers and hamper that come with smell kinda chemically for a few days after purchase - otherwise a great, simple and modern piece.
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than expected for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price and will make a good storage area when the baby gets older.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Modern Baby Changing Table with Laundry Hamper, 3 Storage Baskets, and Pad
product_meta.description:
Color:Gray/WhiteBadger Basket Modern baby Changing Table with Hamper and three baskets is a practical and stylish place for diaper changing and getting baby ready for the day. Includes a large hamper and three baskets. Hamper is fully removable leaving you a convenient spot in the changing table for your diaper pail. Includes a changing pad and safety belt, too. When baby outgrows this table, It becomes a useful piece of furniture for organizing toys and more. Safety rails enclose all four sides around the top of the table. Metal support Bar beneath the changing surface provides additional stability. Hamper and baskets fold for storage. Changing table frame made with multi-layer solid wood, and the shelves are engineered wood with veneer. All paints and finishes are non-toxic. Outside fabric on the baskets is 80% Polyester/20% Cotton. Inside lining on the baskets (including the bottom panel) is non-woven fabric. Changing pad is polyurethane foam covered with wipe clean PEVA (non-PVC) vinyl. Overall unit measures 34.25 inches W x 20.75 inches D x 34.5 inches H. Hamper measures 13.5 inches L x 13.75 inches D x 21.5 inches H. Baskets measure 14.25 inches L x 17 inches W x 7 inches H. Changing pad measures 31.5 inches L x 17.5 inches W x 1 inch H. All measurements approximate. Wipe and spot clean As Needed. Basket color depends on color of the table (baskets are either white or ecru). changing table is for use with children weighing up to 30 lbs. (13.6 kg). adult assembly required. Illustrated assembly instructions included. Meets all currently applicable testing standards. Product includes a limited warranty of 30 Days Parts to the original purchaser. Product may vary slightly from shown and described. Props/accessories shown are for illustration purposes only and are not included with the product. Actual color/finish may vary slightly from screen display. This item ships in its original carton that may include a product photo.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Badger Basket’s Modern Baby Changing Table with Hamper and 3 Baskets is a practical and stylish place for diaper changing and getting baby ready for the day or night. Sophisticated, angular design for any smart, classy nursery. The large hamper contains and conceals dirty duds, or use it to store blankets and toys or bulk packs of diapers and wipes. The hamper has handle slots and easily removes from its shelf to carry to your laundry room. Or, use the hamper elsewhere in the nursery or your house, leaving you a convenient spot in the changing table for your diaper pail or open storage. Three baskets are ideal for changing supplies, linens, baby blankets, lotions, and toiletries. Front handles on the baskets make them easy to open one handed. Baskets slide open smoothly and are fully removable so you can effortlessly access all the space inside. Take the baskets anywhere in the house to fill or empty them. Includes a foam changing pad and safety belt, too. When Baby outgrows this table, it becomes a useful and attractive piece of furniture for organizing toys, stuffed animals, games, puzzles, hats, mittens, blankets, and craft supplies. Safety rails enclose all four sides around the top of the table. Metal support bar beneath the changing surface provides additional stability. Hamper and baskets fold for storage. Just remove the bottom panel and fold flat. Changing Table frame is made with multi-layer solid wood, and the shelves are engineered wood with veneer. All paints and finishes are non-toxic. Outside fabric covering on the baskets is 80% Polyester/20% Cotton. Inside lining on the baskets, including the bottom panels, is non-woven fabric. Changing pad is polyurethane foam covered with wipe clean PEVA (non-PVC) vinyl. Overall unit measures 34.25 inches W x 20.75 inches D x 34.5 inches H. Hamper measures 13.5 inches L x 13.75 inches D x 21.5 inches H. Hamper area of the changing table measures 15 inches W x 18.75 inches D x 24.5 inches H. Baskets measure 12 inches L x 17.25 inches W x 7 inches H. Height from top platform to top of end panels is 5 inches H. Height from top platform to the top side rails is 4 inches. Height clearance from the floor is 3 inches. Changing pad measures 31 inches L x 17.5 inches W x 1 inch H. Assembled weight: 32 lbs. All measurements approximate. Wipe the table and changing pad clean with a damp cloth and mild soap as needed and dry thoroughly. Spot clean hamper and baskets as needed. Never immerse the hamper and baskets in water due to the internal cardboard support panels. Basket color depends on color of the table (baskets are either White or Ecru). Changing table is for use with children weighing up to 30 lbs (13.6 kg). Adult assembly required. Illustrated assembly instructions included. Meets all currently applicable testing standards. Product includes a limited warranty of 30 Days Parts to the original purchaser. Product may vary slightly from shown and described. Props/accessories shown are for illustration purposes only and are not included with the product. Actual color/finish may vary slightly from screen display. This item ships in its original carton which may include a product photo.
feature_bullets: Ample room for diaper changing on top with a laundry hamper and three storage baskets included below
Hamper and baskets pull out easily and are fully removable
Safety rails enclose all four sides of the changing area
Includes foam changing pad and safety belt
Wipe and spot clean as needed
Measures approximately 34.25 inches L x 20.75 inches W x 34.5 inches H
For children weighing up to 30 pounds
Ample room for diaper changing with storage baskets and a hamper included below
Includes safety strap and vinyl/foam changing pad
Safety rails enclose all four sides of the changing area
For children weighing up to 30 pounds

specifications.material_composition: Multi-layer solid wood, shelves are engineered wood with veneer
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars841 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
